posts.title: Auto Shut-Off Safety Outlet
posts.content: Ensure you never accidentally burn down the house by   using this auto shut-off safety outlet. Simply plug it in, set the timer, and you’ll no longer have to worry about curling irons, slow cookers, and other appliances potentially causing a fire if you forget to turn them off.

posts.title: Smooth Baby Soft Foot Exfoliation Mask
posts.content: Give your poor, tired feet the pampering they deserve by rejuvenating them with this smooth baby soft foot exfoliation mask. It is specially designed with skin moisturizing ingredients that will help get rid of dull, coarse, and dead skin.

posts.title: Anime Eyes Sleep Mask
posts.content: The anime eyes sleep mask will keep you looking animated while you get a great night’s rest. The sleep mask keeps the environment pitch black even during the middle of the day while the anime-styled eyes transform you into your favorite anime character.

posts.title: Millennium Falcon Chocolate Mold
posts.content: Prepare to hit your taste buds at light speed with these Millennium Falcon chocolate molds. These geeky Star Wars themed silicone molds can be also be used to create Millennium Falcon shaped ice cubes, and will be a big hit at any geeky party.

posts.title: Garden Knife
posts.content: Garden like you would if you were in the special forces with the garden knife. This ultimate digging tool features a 7″ blade that doubles as a shovel to dig and tear through any surface or plant – if Rambo was a gardener, this is the tool he’d use.

posts.title: Inflatable Pirate Ship
posts.content: Turn your little hell raiser into the scourge of the pool by making him captain of this inflatable pirate ship. This one-person vessel features a fun nautical theme and comes with a small pirate sail and squirt gun to annoy everyone at the local watering hole.

posts.title: Campfire Fork Attachment
posts.content: Cook your wilderness munchies to perfection while grilling over an open flame by impaling them on the campfire fork. Instead of sticking your food through a dirty stick, the fork gives you a hygienic alternative to grill your hot dogs and marshmallows.

posts.title: Pig Pancake Pan
posts.content: Put Grandma’s chocolate-chip pancakes to shame as you one-up her with the pig pancake pan. This adorable non-stick pan creates fluffy pig shaped pancakes that make excellent companions to your heaping servings of bacon.

posts.title: Shark Fin Ice Tray
posts.content: Upon sighting shark fins bobbing around your drink just remember to keep calm and stay cool – icy cool. The shark fin ice tray creates unique fin-shaped cubes that float around your drink as they cool down your liquid contents and frighten children.

posts.title: Wine Holding Party Plates
posts.content: Keep your fine wine close at hand as you sample all the tasty hors d’oeuvres by using the wine holding party plates. Shaped like a slice of Swiss cheese, these plates are the ideal way to enjoy the food being passed around without having to find a table for your drink.

posts.title: Day And Night Heat Sensitive Mug
posts.content: Witness the magical process of daybreak every time you’re on a coffee break by drinking from this day and night heat sensitive mug. Upon adding hot liquid into the ceramic mug, the scenic nighttime landscape begins ceding to the bright day.

posts.title: Floating Cooler
posts.content: Stay pruny while you get drunk at the local clubhouse pool with this floating cooler. The floating base features six convenient cup holders and houses the large cooler full of drinks that you can pass to underage kids who’ll put up with your belligerent stories of past glory.
